title: Pray to God, Pray to Nozomi
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Nozomi-chan~! Happy new year~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>! Happy new year, Kana-chan. Did you come to visit the shrine?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah. Kanata wants to pull a great blessing, so Kanata thought that Kanata should get some spiritual power from you, Nozomi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu. Injecting great blessing~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Mmm, Kanata can feel the great blessing coming.... Ah, hey, Nozomi-chan, are you going to help the shrine for the entire day today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>A lot of people will be coming today, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Is that so. Then, if you have some time off, do you want to go drink some sweet sake? Kanata heard from Shioriko-chan that she went to drink with Kotori-chan the other day and said it was delicious, so Kanata wants to go with you, Nozomi-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, I also heard that from Kotori-chan. I have a lunch break after this, so let’s go together, shall we<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yaay~. Then Kanata will go pray and pull my fortune first while waiting~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m praying that you get your great blessing, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
